Excellent news this week for our 2nd year graduate student [Asinamai Ndai](https://pop.pharmacy.ufl.edu/people/students/asinamai-ndai/), who won best student podium presentation at the 2023 International Society for Pharmacoeconomics and Outcomes Research (ISPOR), one of the biggest meetings in our field. This is the top research award for graduate students at the entire meeting. Congratulations, Asinamai!
